summary: ANTI-LOCK BRAKING SYSTEM HAS FAILED 3 TIMES.  1ST TIME WAS 01-10-03.  2ND TIME WAS 04-11-03 AND 3RD TIME WAS 04-21-03.  IST TIME RESULTED IN ACCIDENT AND LAST 2 TIMES I WAS ABLE TO GET OFF HIGHWAY BEFORE REAR ENDING THE CAR IN FRONT OF ME. I WILL ENTER THE LAST TIME THIS HAPPENED.        *JB
